title: Blood transfusion; hepatitis
context: [PART V. HEPATITIS] [ยง325-91 Blood transfusion; hepatitis.] In the procuring, furnishing, donating, processing, distributing or using of human whole blood, plasma, blood products or blood derivatives for the purpose of injecting or transfusing in the human body, there shall be no implied warranty that the blood, plasma, products or derivatives are free from the virus of serum hepatitis as long as there is no known scientific test to detect the virus of serum hepatitis. [L 1969, c 185, ยง1] Cross References Advisory committees for infected health care workers, see ยง325-18.
